A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson delivers a beautiful though very flawed entry in the Star Wars franchise. The effects and cinematography are the only good things about this film\, the plot is pathetic with a stupid forced chase narrative\, the film is inconsistent with all the previous films including and especially Ep7. Characters are made in to joke versions of themselves\, with the obvious and unneeded destruction of Luke's character. Scenes with poor delivery of lines have been left in. It could have been so much more if anyone with any sense had taken control at any point. This film is possibly the worst sequel in a franchise ever. It is awful. Ep9 will be interesting just to see if anyone can undo this mess but I will never pay Disney willingly again.
